Enables the option to limit the number of visible posts in threads for certain users.

Enables the option to limit the number of visible posts to your feed, regardless of any group rights. Without this option feeds are never restricted, with all feeds are always truncated to the specified standard length! This makes feeds practically useless! Attention, feeds are always sorted chronologically backward, therefore is always the most recent post to see!
Defines the default limit for threads. Can be overridden per forum.
